name: CYTOP CTX-800S
description: CYTOP CTX-800S is an amorphous fluoropolymer that exhibits low refractive index, low coefficient of optical dispersion and good lamination properties. The thermoplastic characteristics of CYTOP CTX-800S, coupled with its transparency, solubility, insulation properties, resistance to chemicals, and oils/water repellency, make it a popular choice for coating electronic materials.
